content: easy knitted bangles by ambah o brien knitting up these bangles is highly satisfying not only are they super-fast to make they require but leftovers of your favourite yarn aim for groups of 3 but they are highly addictive and i soon discovered that they stack up pretty nicely in higher numbers too i made this bevy of bangles in one evening which is handy cos i think they make a great last-minute gift idea as well as a glamorous accessory for your favorite outfit sizes needles instructions small small medium large us 3 / 3 25mm dpns or preferred medium large needles for small circumference the bangles are worked in the round at measurements knitting or size required to obtain a tight gauge causing the stockinette finished circumference 8 / 20 3cm gauge stitch to roll nicely 8 5 / 21 6cm 9 / 22 9cm notions cast on 48 51 56 stitches join to yarn tapestry needle work in the round and continue to 8-ply / dk weight yarn 15 yds / 14 knit until the work measures 1 25 m per bangle gauge / 3 2cm sample shown in madelinetosh dk 6 sts = 1 /2 5cm in stockinette stitch cast off and weave in the ends twist 100% merino antler button in the round twist the bangle so the cast on and jar blue nassau blue charcoal & bound off edges face the inside neon peach give it a little stretch to pull into shape try it on and make another   www ambah co © ambah o brien 2014 for personal use only
